contest-event.event-date:
April 8, 1979 D Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (First Section)
Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (First Section) 10 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest yorkshire-humberside-bba-contest-first-section
Archbishop Holgate Grammar School, York March contest - 1st Kirkbymoorside, 2nd York Railway, 3rd Lingdale. 5 bands competed.
Dec. 8, 2011, 9:43 p.m. Feb. 26, 2020, 2:02 p.m.
1 Kirkbymoorside Town Band Les Maw
2 York Railway Institute G. E. Pratt
3 Lingdale Silver Band Alan Morrison
Unknown Result Askern Colliery Band Fred Lowery
Unknown Result Barrow Concert Dennis Wheeler
